name: Hockey Night In The Basement: The Chantier Father and Son cool sport night - Free Edition
name_original: Hockey Night In The Basement: The Chantier Father and Son cool sport night - Free Edition
description:
HOCKEY NIGHT OUT!

In this weekend, the Chantier Family is out for the hockey night.

And today, father and his boy playing hockey game with options to choose from 3 hockey tables. Let's see who is gonna win this game.

Control the mallet by hitting back to puck. Also, you have to drop the puck on opposite side slot which serve as goal to make the point.

Time to concentrate for hours, and off-course! hours of fun to see Chantier Family!!

Do you want to contact Chantier family - They love to hear from you about there game. Email them at: family@craquespotes.com
